name: Chrysalis
description: Chrysalis is a metamorphic testing framework in Python that verifies software robustness and reliability.

name: Hack at UCI
description: Hack at UCI is a student-run organization established to provide students with a platform to learn, grow, and develop technology.

name: Wordle Guesser
description: Wordle Guesser is a program designed to accurately guess the daily Wordle based on positional letter frequency.

name: Shareloft
description: Shareloft is a private community and platform for thousands of retail investors hosted by Tesla analyst and YouTuber Rob Maurer.
